attributes.action: Stop Nicola sturgeon having a referendrum until at least 2 years after Brexit
attributes.background:
Nicola Stergoen wishes to have another Scottish Referendum again due to the Uk voting to leave the EU . 
We call on the Uk government to not accept her request until 2021 so that Scottish voters have a clear view of what Brexit is like
This will also stop Nicola sturgeon using project fear .
